title: Second budget reading will include nearly 600 proposed amendments
summary_full: Latvia's parliament, the Saeima, may have passed the government's spending plans for 2026 in a first reading, but deputies will have plenty more work to do on it as almost 600 amendments have been appended to it ahead of its second reading.
